metadata.title: All-in-One Pack | Tech + Data + Legal | SanahujaDev
metadata.description: Absolute control of your digital asset. We unify Web Maintenance (WPO), Analytics (GA4), and Legal Compliance (Cookies) in a single fee.

hero.h1_lead: The essentials for a serious digital business. We unify technical stability (Maintenance), business intelligence (GA4 Reports), and legal peace of mind (Cookies). No frills, just performance.

painPoints.title: Navigating blindly is dangerous
painPoints.content: Having a website without maintenance is a risk. Having it without analytics is flying blind. And having it without cookie management is illegal. Managing this separately is expensive and chaotic.
list: Websites that break or are slow
Total lack of knowledge about visits

solution.title: Your Unified Technical Ecosystem
solution.content: This pack solves the three technical headaches at once. I make sure it works, that it's legal, and I tell you how many people come in and buy.

features.title: Data Intelligence
features.description: Monthly Visibility Report (GA4) explained in plain English.

features.title: Legal Compliance
features.description: Management and implementation of the Cookie Banner (Consent Mode).

features.title: Technology Partner
features.description: Priority technical support for any incident.

onboarding.title: Phase 1: Setup
steps: Initial Audit: I review the status of security, speed, and Google tags.
Legalization: I configure your Cookie Banner to comply with the law without losing data.
Connection: I link your website to my monitoring systems.

monthlyCycle.title: Phase 2: The Monthly Cycle
steps: Continuous Surveillance: Your website is monitored 24/7. If it goes down, I'll fix it.
Optimization: Technical adjustments to maintain high speed (WPO).
Report: At the end of the month you will receive your status and visitor report.

pricing.title: Tech and Data, simplified
pricing.content: Hiring a technician and an analyst separately would cost you much more. Here you have the fundamental basis of your digital business in a single invoice.
pricing.slogan: You save €15/month compared to hiring separately.

downsell.title: Prefer to go step by step?
downsell.content: If the 'All-in-One' pack seems like too much to start with, don't worry. First, secure the essentials: the technical side.

offer.name: Essential Web Maintenance
offer.description: We make sure your website doesn't break, is secure, and loads quickly for just €40/month. The solid foundation to grow later.

ctaFinal.title: The CEO's Decision
ctaFinal.content: For just €35 more than basic maintenance, you get access to data intelligence. It is the investment that drives your business.
